name: Installation of data cabling and outlets
template name: Installation of data cabling and outlets

name: Confirm that the cable support system has been completed as per documentation
Data cabling has been selected as per drawings and specifications (Cat6/CatA & brand)
Mechanical protection has been provided to minimise the likelihood of physical damage to cabling
Cabling has been concealed where possible in ceiling spaces, wall cavities or risers
All outlets have been wired as per drawings
All data outlets have been numbered and marked on the site as built drawing
Height and location have been confirmed for each outlet
Equipment/materials have been selected and installed as per drawings/specifications
Terminations have been checked and all terminations are correct and secure in all outlets
Outlets have all been secured in place and levelled
All cabling has been tested using the Fluke data tester
Each cable has been correctly installed and terminated in the patch panel
Each outlet marked on the site as buildÅfs
FINAL - Pass when happy to proceed with work(s) (Any issues please comment below)
